subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Rafael Nadal saved three match points before beating Novak Djokovic on Saturday, 3-6, 7-6 (5), 7-6 (9), to reach the Madrid Open final.
snippet: Top-ranked Rafael Nadal saved three match points before beating Novak Djokovic on Saturday, 3-6, 7-6 (5), 7-6 (9), to reach the Madrid Open final.
